author: chirino
msg: Set the java.io.tmpdir to be the ${ACTIVEM_BASE}/tmp directory.  This way it's easy to find and delete temp files (like the ones jetty uses).

msg: OPENJPA-2123.  Just check the value of db2ServerType instead of calling isDB2ZOSV8xOrLater().

author: stack
msg: HBASE-5422 StartupBulkAssigner would cause a lot of timeout on RIT when assigning large numbers of regions (timeout = 3 mins)
